title: Deflection Trial
body: The kinetic impactor test against NEO 2027-XQ achieved measurable trajectory change. Surface ejecta analysis confirms momentum transfer exceeded predictions by 11%. Follow-up tracking will validate orbital shift before proposing scaled interventions.

title: Shield Test
body: Phase 2 trials of the micro-meteoroid shielding lattice completed in low-Earth orbit. Structural integrity held against 0.2g projectiles. Real-time deformation feedback showed promising resilience, with reconfiguration systems triggering within 30ms.

title: Hydrate Scan
body: NEO survey drone GR-91 identified subsurface hydrated minerals on Apollo-class object 1998-KV. Spectrometry shows signatures consistent with phyllosilicates. Findings support theories of water transport and potential for future in-situ fuel extraction.
